Title: Road Kill
Plot: Dexter has always known his father?s Code was meant to protect him from exposure. But after committing a serious mistake, he wonders if it could have been designed to protect him from something even more dangerous ? human emotion. When he discovers that Trinity is planning an out-of-town trip, Dexter sees an opportunity to ride along and gain insight into the mind of a fellow monster.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Courtney Ford, Julia Campbell, Brando Eaton, Greg Ellis, John Griffin, Vanessa Marano, Heidi Brook Myers, Esther Paik, Greg Joung Paik
